item.title: Affiliate Links
item.description:
• Contains affiliate links, which means that if you click on one of the product links, I’ll receive a small commission at no extra cost to you.
  • Amazon
  • Midwest Grow Kits
  • TubeBuddy

Items we suggest you avoid or goto a atlernate vendor

  • Basic Medical Synmax Vinyl Exam Gloves - Latex-Free & Powder-Free - X-Large, BMPF-3004(Case of 1,000),Blue 100 Count these are cheap and break very easily. Unfortunally I bought 1000 of them so I just have to deal with it. Should teach me.
  • North Spore Organic Lion’s Mane Mushroom Spray & Grow Kit I think there are better options, while this kit is not bad I like the grow kits from Myco labs better.

Products purchases from online vendors for videos, every item on this list we have personally used.

Top Items we love

  • Echosphere 3.0 kit
  • 500ml Glass Round Media Storage Bottles
  • Ball Mason 32 oz Wide Mouth Jars with Lids and Bands
  • Magic Mill Food Dehydrator Machine
  • 3M Micropore Tape Great Price!

Spawn Media

  • BEN’S ORIGINAL Ready Rice Whole Grain Brown Rice Pouch (Pack of 12)
  • Minute RTS Brown Rice, 2-4.4 Ounce Cups (Pack of 8)
  • 100% Organic Rye Berries 5lb
  • Bulk Organic Rye Berries (40 LBS)
  • Premium 5-Grain Spawn Bags
    • 3-Pack Premium 24 Oz Super-Quick-Colonizing 5-grain Jar (24oz)

Substrate Media (Hay, Wood Pelets, Perlite, Coco )

  • Compressed Organic Coco Coir Brick 1.4 Lb
  • 8QT Professional Grade Plantation Products Vermiculite
  • Jovvily Wheat Bran - 2lb
  • Ultra-Fine Lab Grade Gypsum for Mushrooms
  • Midwest’s Select Bulk Substrate Casing Mix - 5 pounds

Agar Peitri and Ketchup Cups

  • 500ml Glass Round Media Storage Bottles
  • 6Pcs PTFE Magnetic Stirrer Bar
  • Agar Agar Powder
  • Digital Gram Scale 500g 0.01g Food Scale
  • Dried Malt Extract Light (Powder Form)
  • HiMedia RM001V-100G HiVeg Peptone, 100g
  • Plastic Portion Cups With Lid

Other items we use

  • #11 Surgical Blades with #3 Scalpel Knife
  • 10mL/cc Plastic Luer Lock Syringes Without Needle, Individually Sterile Wrapped, with Tip Cap
  • 3M Micropore Tape
  • AC Infinity 4" Backdraft Damper
  • All-in-One Bulk Monobag Kit
  • Aluminum Pressure Canner, 22 Quart
  • Ball Mason 32 oz Wide Mouth Jars with Lids and Bands
  • Boomer Shroomer Inflatable Monotub
  • Brew Bag, 2 Pack Extra Large
  • COSORI Food Dehydrator Machine
  • Continuous Spray Bottle (10.1oz/300ml) Mist Ultra Fine
  • Cordyceps Militaris Complete Grow Kit (16oz Jar)
  • Fresh Air Amplifier Fan Unit For Ecosphere Greenhouse Systems
  • Gardening Scissors Hand Pruner
  • Govee Hygrometer Thermometer H5075
  • Hand held Vacuum Sealer Bags
  • Jarden Ball(r) Wide Mouth Leak-proof Storage Lids 6/pkg-grey, Black
  • Large Still Air Box Mushroom
  • MERV 13 Material for Air Filters
  • Magic Mill Food Dehydrator Machine
  • Mushroom Candy Bar Silicone Mold
  • Mushroom Dome
  • Myco Labs Grower’s Select Mushroom Monotub Fruiting Chamber with Filter Disks and Liner
  • Polyfil Synthetic Fibers (One Quart)
  • Premium Liquid Culture Kit - Easy Spore Germinating & Mushroom Cloning System
  • Real Mushrooms Reishi Powder - Organic Mushroom Extract
  • Sterilite 6 Quart ClearView Latch - Shoebox
  • WEST TUNE 3000rpm Magnetic Stirrer Mixer

Equipment and website maintenance

  • GoPro HERO8 Black - Waterproof Action Camera with Touch Screen 4K Ultra HD
  • 20W USB C Power Strip, 321 Power Strip with 3 Outlets and USB C

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Dear Readers,

Embark on a journey into the enchanting realm of mycology, a scientific discipline that unveils the mysteries of fungi, Earth’s often overlooked, yet profoundly influential organisms. As we extend a warm welcome to you, we invite you to explore the captivating world of mushrooms, molds, yeasts, and their intricate interactions with the ecosystems they inhabit.

Discover the Hidden Kingdom:

Fungi constitute their own kingdom, separate from plants and animals, showcasing a diversity that is both astonishing and essential to life on our planet. From the towering majesty of mushroom fruiting bodies to the microscopic intricacies of mycelial networks, mycology offers a window into a kingdom that plays a crucial role in nutrient cycling, decomposition, and symbiotic relationships.

item.title: Frequently asked questions (FAQ)
item.description:
General Questions

Are you being paid by any of the companies that you have reviewed products for

As of 2024-01-11 I have not been paid one penny and I have purchased all my products. If that every changes I will be sure to state that in future reviews.

Update 2024-01-24 I have joined the Amazon Associate program

Amazon Affiliate Disclaimer: “As an Amazon Associate, I earn from qualifying purchases. This video and description may contain affiliate links, which means that if you click on one of the product links, I’ll receive a small commission at no extra cost to you. This helps support the channel and allows us to continue to make videos like this. Thank you for the support!
